articles.description: Here's what we know so far about the next major update to Apple's iPhone software
articles.content: iOS 18 won't be like recent iPhone software updates, according to insiders familiar with Apple's plans for next year's big release. In recent times, we've gotten relatively uneventful updates, charac… [+8026 chars]
